name: Coffee Feet
description:
You are Mr. Coffee Feet, and the universe seems to be collapsing in on itself inside a café. A mysterious figure suggests you let the customers drink from your divine body, as he believes that will help for some reason.

Traverse the increasingly wild cafe to serve each customer, then return to the counter at the start to proceed to the next level.

A,D to Move

W to Jump

Made over 3 days for Weekly Game Jam 159

Made by Alex Saunders

The browser version may take a while to load, and has no loading bar, it's just a black screen, so please be patient, it should work :)
